item.title: Life Lessons from Curling
item.description: TL;DNR Curling is a game about communication and adapting on the fly. Things don't always go perfectly as planned, so you need to be able to react. Never give up on a stone. It might look grim, but you never know what might happen and how you might be able to use something. The Spirit of Curling is really what it's all about. It's not whether you win or lose.
